title: #DELETEGAREN #NOMOREGAREN
body: PLEASE DELETE THIS FUCK OF A CHAMPION PLEASE. HOLY SHIT GAREN SO GARBAGE UNSKILLED. DELETE THIS GARBAGE OR NERF HIM TO THE POINT WHERE HE CANT COUNTER SHIT THANKS

replies.body: I agree that Garen should be removed from this game as his health regen is identical to barons
Yes for the sake of bronze players, garen must be remove.
